VISIT OPPORTUNITIESOngoing Chapman Tours & Experiences

We hope you and your family can visit Chapman, in-person or virtually. You can view all ongoing opportunities below, or select opportunities based on student or event type. Intersection UnionShow me:

In-PersonVirtualFirst-YearTransferToursAcademicStudent ExperienceGuided Campus Tour (In-person)Tours are led by current students and offered on weekdays.Schedule a TourGuided Campus Tour (Virtual)Current students will show you around and answer all your questions.Schedule a Virtual TourSelf-guided Tour (In-person)Use our mobile app for routes and student commentary (in English or Spanish).Schedule a Self-guided TourConservatory of Music Tour (In-Person)Request a tour of the conservatory and optional music lesson.Request a TourConservatory of Music Tour (Virtual)Request a tour of the conservatory and optional music lesson.Request a TourDepartment of Dance Tour (In-person)Visit dance studios, classrooms and performance spaces.Schedule a Dance TourDodge College of Film & Media Arts Tour (In-person)Explore state-of-the-art facilities in a student-led tour of the college.Schedule a Dodge TourDodge College of Film & Media Arts Tour (Virtual)Virtually visit all of Dodge's buildings in a student-led tour of the college.Schedule a Virtual Dodge TourKeck Center for Science & Engineering Tour (In-Person)Explore our science and engineering facilities on this student-led tour.Schedule a Keck TourKeck Center for Science & Engineering Tour (Virtual)Check out some of the best facilities in the country for undergraduate STEM students.Schedule a Virtual Keck TourDepartment of Dance Tour (Virtual)Virtually visit dance studios, classrooms and performance spaces.Schedule a Virtual Dance TourFirst-Year Information Session (Virtual)Learn more about Chapman and the application process.Schedule a Virtual First-Year Info SessionTransfer Information Session (Virtual)A Transfer Team member will introduce you to Chapman, explain the transfer process and answer questions.Schedule a Virtual Transfer Info SessionTransfer Information Session (In-person)A Transfer Team member will introduce you to Chapman, explain the transfer process and answer questions.Schedule a Transfer Info SessionAthletics Information Session (Virtual)Learn more about the student-athlete experience at Chapman from current students and coaches.Schedule a Virtual Athletics Information SessionDiversity & Inclusion Information Session (Virtual)Learn more about the Chapman Family and our commitment to providing an inclusive, supportive environment for all students.Schedule a Virtual Diversity & Inclusion Information SessionStudent Involvement Information Session (Virtual)Join the Department of Student Engagement to learn about finding your community at Chapman.Schedule a Virtual Student Involvement Information SessionStudy Abroad Information Session (Virtual)Learn more about the Center for Global Education and study abroad opportunities.Schedule a Virtual Study Aroad Information SessionBusiness and Economics Information Session (Virtual)Learn about the majors and student opportunities in the Argyros School of Business.Schedule a Virtual Business and Economics Information SessionEducational Studies Information Session (Virtual)Members from Attallah College of Educational Studies will talk about pathways for pursuing educational studies.Schedule a Virtual Educational Studies Information SessionEngineering Information Session (Virtual)Learn more about the Fowler School of Engineering and student opportunities.Schedule a Virtual Engineering Information SessionPre-Pharmacy Information Session (Virtual)Learn how you can earn a Doctor of Pharmacy degree in just five years after high school.Schedule a Virtual Pre-Pharmacy Information SessionScience & Technology Information Session (Virtual)Learn about what opportunities the Schmid College of Science & Technology has to offer.Schedule a Virtual Science & Technology Information SessionUndecided Information Session (Virtual)Current students and staff will discuss how Chapman provides support to undecided/undeclared students.Schedule a Virtual Undecided Information SessionFellows Interview (Virtual)Meet an Admission Fellow (current Chapman student) by phone or video.Schedule a Virtual Fellows InterviewRecorded Virtual EventsIf you missed a virtual event, you can check if we have it on our Recorded Events page. You’ll find sessions on applying to Chapman, financial aid, student life and academics.View Recorded EventsTake a Self-guided Virtual Tour

Virtually explore Chapman in this student-led tour through our Orange Campus. You'll be able to visit classrooms, hang-out spots, our residence life area and much more!Launch ExperienceVideo Tour: Dodge College of Film & Media ArtsVideo Tour: Keck Center for Science & EngineeringVideo Tour: Crean College of Health & Behavioral SciencesAsk a Student

Our students are happy to help you learn more about their major, life at Chapman or what it’s like to be a college student.Contact UsMaps & DirectionsEmergencyOrange CampusOne University Drive
